Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She made him to eat the offspring of the frogs. Made him to work in the field to sow radishes. Got his head beaten with slippers and sent him out to graze his sheep.

lines.gurmukhi: pRQm phr sYXd rmY; syK dUsry Awin ]
lines.transliteration_english: pratham pahar saiyadh ramai; sekh dhoosare aan ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: प्रथम पहर सैयद रमै सेख दूसरे आनि ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: In the first quarter of the day, came the Sayeed, the Sheikh in the second,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਪਹਿਲੇ ਪਹਿਰ ਵਿਚ ਸੱਯਦ ਰਮਣ ਕਰਦਾ ਸੀ ਅਤੇ ਦੂਜੇ ਪਹਿਰ ਸ਼ੇਖ ਆ ਜਾਦਾ ਸੀ।

lines.gurmukhi: iqRiqX phr muglwveI; cOQy phr pTwn ]5]
lines.transliteration_english: tritiy pahar mugalaave'ee; chouthe pahar pattaan ||5||
lines.transliteration_hindi: त्रितिय पहर मुगलावई चौथे पहर पठान ॥५॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The Mughal in the third and in the fourth quarter came the Pathan, to enjoy sex with her.(5)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਤੀਜੇ ਪਹਿਰ ਮੁਗ਼ਲ ਆ ਜਾਦਾ ਸੀ ਅਤੇ ਚੌਥੇ ਪਹਿਰ ਪਠਾਨ (ਆ ਜਾਦਾ ਸੀ) ॥੫॥

lines.gurmukhi: cOpeI ]
lines.transliteration_english: choupe'ee ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: चौपई ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Chaupaee

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਚੌਪਈ:

lines.gurmukhi: BUl pTwn pRQm hI AwXo ]
lines.transliteration_english: bhool pattaan pratham hee aayo ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: भूल पठान प्रथम ही आयो ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Forgetting the turn, one day the Pathan came in before anybody else.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਇਕ ਵਾਰ) ਪਠਾਨ ਭੁਲ ਕੇ ਪਹਿਲਾ ਹੀ ਆ ਗਿਆ।

lines.gurmukhi: puin sYXd muiK Awin idKwXo ]
lines.transliteration_english: pun saiyadh mukh aan dhikhaayo ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: पुनि सैयद मुखि आनि दिखायो ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Following him the Sayeed entered as well.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਫਿਰ ਸੱਯਦ ਨੇ ਵੀ ਆ ਕੇ ਸ਼ਕਲ ਵਿਖਾਈ।

lines.gurmukhi: lY su pTwn Kwt qr dIno ]
lines.transliteration_english: lai su pattaan khaaT tar dheeno ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: लै सु पठान खाट तर दीनो ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She made the Path an to hide under the bed

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਉਸ ਨੇ) ਪਠਾਨ ਨੂੰ ਮੰਜੀ ਹੇਠਾ ਕਰ ਦਿੱਤਾ

lines.gurmukhi: sYXdih lwie gry sO lIno ]6]
lines.transliteration_english: saiyadheh laae gare so leeno ||6||
lines.transliteration_hindi: सैयदहि लाइ गरे सौ लीनो ॥६॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: And took Sayeed in an embrace.( 6)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਅਤੇ ਸੱਯਦ ਨੂੰ ਗਲੇ ਨਾਲ ਲਗਾ ਲਿਆ ॥੬॥

lines.gurmukhi: syK sYXd ky pwCy AwXo ]
lines.transliteration_english: sekh saiyadh ke paachhe aayo ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: सेख सैयद के पाछे आयो ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: Incidentally, immediately after the Sayeed the Sheikh walked in,

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਸ਼ੇਖ ਸੱਯਦ ਦੇ ਪਿਛੋਂ ਆ ਗਿਆ।

lines.gurmukhi: Gws ibKY sYXdih CpwXo ]
lines.transliteration_english: ghaas bikhai saiyadheh chhapaayo ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: घास बिखै सैयदहि छपायो ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: And she hid the Sayeed in hay.

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਇਸਤਰੀ ਨੇ) ਸੱਯਦ ਨੂੰ ਘਾਹ ਵਿਚ ਲੁਕਾ ਦਿੱਤਾ।

lines.gurmukhi: qb lO mugl Awie hI gXo ]
lines.transliteration_english: tab lo mugal aae hee gayo ||
lines.transliteration_hindi: तब लौ मुगल आइ ही गयो ॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: The Mughal was not far off and seeing him

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: ਤਦ ਤਕ ਮੁਗ਼ਲ ਵੀ ਆ ਗਿਆ।

lines.gurmukhi: syKih fwir goin mih dIXo ]7]
lines.transliteration_english: sekheh ddaar gon meh dheeyo ||7||
lines.transliteration_hindi: सेखहि डारि गोनि महि दीयो ॥७॥

Dr. Surinder Singh Kohli.translation: She entrapped the Sheikh in an hessian bag.(7)

Dr. Rattan Singh Jaggi.translation: (ਤਾ) ਸ਼ੇਖ ਨੂੰ ਇਕ ਬੋਰੀ ('ਗੋਨਿ') ਵਿਚ ਪਾ ਦਿੱਤਾ ॥੭॥
